mapper.select: select t.id,t.cust_code custCode,t.cust_name custName,sum(t1.contract_amount) amount from t_pss_customer t left join t_pss_contract_sale t1 on t.cust_code = t1.part_a group by t.id,t.cust_code,t.cust_name order by sum(t1.contract_amount) desc

SELECT t.material_code materialCode, t1.material_name materialName, IFNULL( sum(t.quantity * t.price_tax), 0 ) amount, ( SELECT IFNULL(sum(quantity * price_tax), 0) FROM t_pss_material_detail x WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM t_pss_contract_sale y WHERE x.foreign_code = y.contract_code ) ) totalSales FROM t_pss_material_detail t INNER JOIN t_pss_contract_sale t2 ON t.foreign_code = t2.contract_code LEFT JOIN t_pss_material_mgt t1 ON t.material_code = t1.material_code GROUP BY t.material_code, t1.material_name LIMIT 5
select left(t.create_time,7) year,sum(contract_amount) amount from t_pss_contract_sale t where t.contract_status = '4' group by left(t.create_time,7) order by left(t.create_time,7) desc limit 6

select t.order_send_code orderSendCode,t.send_time sendTime,t2.supplier_name supplierName from t_pss_order_send t left join t_pss_order t1 on t.order_code = t1.order_code left join t_pss_supplier t2 on t1.supplier_code = t2.supplier_code where t.send_status = '1' order by t.id desc limit 20

select t.material_code materialCode,t2.material_name materialName,sum(t.send_quantity) sendQuantity from t_pss_material_detail_send t left join t_pss_material_mgt t2 on t.material_code = t2.material_code where exists (select 1 from t_pss_order_send t1 where t.foreign_code = t1.order_send_code) and t2.measure_unit = '吨' group by t.material_code,t2.material_name order by sum(t.send_quantity) DESC limit 5

select t.cust_name custName,t.addr,t.type,t1.note typeName,t.contracts,t.contract_tel contractTel,t.latitude,t.longitude, IFNULL(t2.amount,0) amount from t_pss_customer t left join t_pss_dict_tree t1 on t.type = t1.code and t1.type ='KHLX' left join (select part_a,sum(contract_amount) amount from t_pss_contract_sale group by part_a) t2 on t.cust_code = t2.part_a where 1=1 and t.addr like '%恩施%'
select t.type,t1.note typeName,count(t.supplier_code) count from t_pss_supplier t left join t_pss_dict_tree t1 on t.type = t1.`code` and t1.type ='GYSLX' group by t.type,t1.note
